EmailTemplate.description: Friendly Reminder of Invoices Overdue Template
EmailTemplate.name: FS-Friendly Reminder of Invoices Overdue Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Friendly Reminder of Invoices Overdue
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.LastName} ,
This is just a friendly reminder that your account with us appears as past due, to view and pay your invoices please click on the link here to manage payments overdue.
Thank you, The New York State Bar Association One Elk Street Albany, NY 12207 518-463-3200 www.nysba.org"
